alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Northwest Beaverhead County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:14PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Beaverhead County through 600 PM MDT... At 514 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Jackson, or 32 miles northwest of Dillon, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Polaris. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Northwest Beaverhead County
